entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
